name: Landing Beacon
uniques: Automatically built in all cities where it is buildable
Gain a free [Food Lab] [in this city]
quote: Keep the signal going, and we'll help out whenever we can. Know that there's still life up here, and so what you need to do to keep life going down there.

civilopediaText.text: Keep the signal going, and we'll help out whenever we can. Know that there's still life up here, and so what you need to do to keep life going down there.

name: Food Lab
uniques: [10]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city]
[10]% Food is carried over after population increases [in this city] <after discovering [Refrigeration]>

name: Launchpad
uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing [Air] units [in this city] <when above [-2] [Power]>
[+15]% Production when constructing [All] wonders [in this city] <when above [-2] [Power]>
